title: System Settings
subtitle: Manage application configuration and feature settings

api.title: API Configuration
api.no_apis_available: No API configurations available, please add and enable APIs first
api.model1_description: Deprecated: OCR uses dedicated engines (DeepSeek-OCR / PaddleOCR-VL-1.5)
api.model2_description: Used for AI conversation and deep analysis, reasoning models work better
api.anki_card_description: Used for Anki card generation, intelligently create Q&A cards from learning content
api.embedding_description: Used for RAG knowledge base vector embedding, requires embedding-type model
api.reranker_description: Used for RAG search result reranking to improve retrieval accuracy
api.summary_description: Deprecated. Summary model is no longer used.

modal.subtitle: Configure your AI model endpoints and base settings
modal.model_name_hint: Provide the exact model identifier used for API calls

reasoning.title: Reasoning / Chain-of-thought settings
reasoning.enable_thinking_hint: Send the enable_thinking flag when this model supports it.
reasoning.thinking_disabled_hint: This model is not marked as reasoning-capable; options are disabled automatically.
reasoning.unsupported_enable_hint: This model does not support the enable_thinking parameter
reasoning.include_thoughts_hint: Maps to include_thoughts to request a reasoning summary.
reasoning.unsupported_include_hint: This model does not support the include_thoughts parameter
reasoning.note: These settings map to provider-specific options (OpenAI reasoning.effort, Claude thinking, Gemini thinkingBudget/include_thoughts).

fields.thinking_budget_hint: Note: Anthropic (Claude) models require minimum 1024; other reasoning models (e.g. Gemini) support smaller values (e.g. 256)
fields.temperature_hint: Controls randomness between 0-2. Lower values are more deterministic; higher values are more creative. Default: 0.7
fields.max_tokens_hint: Maximum tokens returned per response. Limits vary by modelâ€”GPT-4 allows 8192 tokens, some offer more.
fields.qwen_hint: Heads-up: SiliconFlow's Qwen models may be limited to 4096 tokens
fields.max_tokens_limit_hint: Some APIs (e.g., DeepSeek) have a max_tokens cap (e.g., 8192). Exceeding it returns a 400 error. Leave empty for no limit.
fields.context_window_placeholder: Leave empty to use auto-inferred value
fields.context_window_hint: The model's context window size (tokens). Leave empty to auto-infer from model name. Current inferred value:

modal.min_p_hint: Note: min_p is ignored by Gemini

anthropic.title: Enable Claude Extended Thinking
anthropic.description: Request Claude to return its thinking trace when supported.
anthropic.budget_hint: Leave blank to use the model default.

google.auto_thinking_hint: For supported Gemini reasoning models, thinking mode and thought summary are automatically enabled by default when you create a new configuration. You can still adjust or disable them here if needed.
google.base_url_hint: Use the root domain only; omit /v1 or /v1beta. Example: https://generativelanguage.googleapis.com

deepseek.title: DeepSeek Thinking Mode
deepseek.description: DeepSeek V3.2 uses thinking.type format to control chain-of-thought
deepseek.enable_thinking_hint: When enabled, the model outputs reasoning_content with its thought process
deepseek.v31_warning: DeepSeek V3.1 automatically disables thinking mode when using tools

qwen.title: Qwen Reasoning Configuration
qwen.description: Qwen3 supports enable_thinking, thinking_budget, and reasoning_effort parameters
qwen.enable_thinking_hint: Qwen3 dual-mode switch, outputs reasoning_content when enabled

grok.title: xAI Grok Configuration
grok.description: reasoning_effort only supported by grok-3-mini, Grok-4 has parameter restrictions
grok.reasoning_effort_hint: Grok-3-Mini only supports low and high levels
grok.grok4_warning: Grok-4 does not support presence_penalty, frequency_penalty, and stop parameters

doubao.title: ByteDance Doubao Thinking Configuration
doubao.description: Doubao Seed series supports thinking.type: enabled/disabled/auto
doubao.thinking_mode_hint: auto mode only supported by doubao-seed series models

zhipu.title: Zhipu GLM Thinking Configuration
zhipu.description: GLM-4.7 enables thinking by default, supports clear_thinking parameter
zhipu.enable_thinking_hint: GLM-4.7 enabled by default, can be explicitly disabled
zhipu.preserve_thinking_hint: Set clear_thinking=false to preserve thinking chain across turns

moonshot.title: Kimi Thinking Configuration
moonshot.description: Kimi K2 Thinking models enforce temperature=1.0, max_tokensâ‰¥16000
moonshot.auto_config: Kimi Thinking models automatically adjust parameters: temperature=1.0, max_tokensâ‰¥16000
moonshot.reasoning_content: Thinking chain is automatically returned via reasoning_content field, no extra configuration needed

minimax.title: MiniMax Configuration
minimax.description: MiniMax does not support enable_thinking, uses reasoning_split to control thinking separation
minimax.reasoning_split_hint: Separate thinking content to reasoning_details field
minimax.no_enable_thinking: MiniMax API does not support enable_thinking parameter

capabilities.title: Model capabilities
capabilities.description: Tag the model with the abilities it supports

multimodal.title: Multimodal model
multimodal.description: Indicates the model accepts image input (e.g. GPT-4V, Claude 3).

reasoning.title: Reasoning model
reasoning.description: Indicates the model offers advanced reasoning capabilities.

embedding.title: Embedding model
embedding.description: Marks the model as suitable for vector embeddings (e.g. text-embedding-ada-002, bge-m3).

reranker.title: Reranker model
reranker.description: Marks the model for search result reranking (e.g. bge-reranker-v2-m3).

tools.title: Tool-calling support
tools.description: Indicates the model supports OpenAI function calling / tools for MCP, web search, or RAG.

adapter.title: Model adapter
adapter.description: Choose the adapter that best matches provider-specific parameters and features
adapter.helper: Adapters automatically preload known capabilities and defaults.

vendor_panel.empty_vendors_desc: Create a provider to reuse API keys and shared parameters across models.

vendor_panel.delete_model_desc: This action cannot be undone. Please proceed carefully.
vendor_panel.delete_vendor_desc: Deleting a provider will also remove all model configurations under it.

features.title: Feature Settings

theme.description: Switch appearance modes and curated palettes tailored for different environments

palettes.default_desc: Deep blue tones, balanced interaction and status feedback
palettes.purple_desc: Elegant purple tones for calm and focused atmosphere
palettes.green_desc: Natural green tones, soothing and eye-friendly
palettes.orange_desc: Warm orange tones, vibrant and energetic
palettes.pink_desc: Soft pink tones, warm and romantic
palettes.teal_desc: Fresh teal tones, modern and minimal
palettes.muted_desc: Low saturation colors, reduces eye strain for extended use
palettes.paper_desc: Paper-like background with soft ink colors, comfortable for long reading
palettes.custom_desc: Pick any color as your theme accent, the system will generate a full palette automatically

zoom.title: Global UI Zoom (Experimental)
zoom.description: Available on desktop and mobile (Tauri). Calls the native WebView zoom API so you can quickly scale the entire interface. Slight blurring may occur at high ratios.
zoom.not_supported: Not available in browser builds. Please use the desktop client.

font.title: Global Font
font.description: Set the global font for the app interface. Some special areas may not be affected.
font.size_description: Adjust the global font size for most interface text.

debug.description: For debugging global streaming sessions and events

markdown.render_mode_desc: Enhanced mode provides improved Markdown/LaTeX streaming rendering with error tolerance. Switch to legacy mode if you encounter compatibility issues

ocr.title: OCR Recognition Settings

general.title: General

general.skip_multimodal_desc: Skip OCR when the current chat model supports image understanding

pdf.title: PDF Recognition
pdf.enabled_desc: Automatically perform multi-page OCR when extracted text from PDF is below threshold

openSource.title: Open Source Acknowledgements

topbar_top_margin.title: Topbar Top Margin Height
topbar_top_margin.desc: Adjust the top margin height of content-header virtual-titlebar. Commonly used on Android to reserve space for the status bar. Unit is px, set to 0 for no margin.

mcp.title: MCP Tool Protocol

preview.description: Displays a snapshot of tools, prompts, and resources for the selected server.

usage_tips.subtitle: Recommended operational procedures
usage_tips.tip1: After adding or modifying servers, save configuration first, then click "Reconnect & Preheat" to ensure frontend SDK updates.
usage_tips.tip2: If the tool list is obviously abnormal, use "Refresh List" or "Clear Cache" before reconnecting.
usage_tips.tip3: After selecting MCP tools in the chat, message-level enabling is controlled by session settings, no global switch needed.

mcp.backend_disabled_hint: Backend MCP feature is not enabled. Please enable the mcp feature in Cargo.toml and retry.

goals.label: Learning Goals
goals.placeholder: e.g. Improve function graph problems within two months while keeping TOEFL math vocabulary fresh.
goals.hint: Describe short-term or long-term objectives so the assistant can plan pacing.

communication.label: Communication Preferences
communication.placeholder: e.g. Prefer step-by-step prompts with brief summaries and an encouraging tone.
communication.hint: Specify tone, cadence, or interaction style you find most helpful.

notes.label: Additional Notes
notes.placeholder: e.g. Exam is near; highlight common mistakes. Provide bilingual terminology when English terms appear.
notes.hint: Add any extra constraints or special instructions.

field_labels.semantic_search_fts_filter: Use FTS Pre-filter for Semantic Search

sections.shortcuts_desc: View and customize command palette shortcuts
sections.statistics_desc: View overall data overview, trend analysis and vector index status
sections.data_manage_desc: Manage backup/restore, data import/export and cloud sync settings
sections.params_desc: Configure system parameters, recommendation strategies and index maintenance options
sections.external_search_desc: Configure available external search engines and their invocation strategies
sections.search_engine_desc: Select the preferred search engine, different engines have different features and coverage
sections.advanced_search_desc: Fine-tune external search concurrency, strategy and cache behavior
sections.injection_settings_desc: Configure default injection content and filtering strategy
sections.snippet_truncate_desc: Truncation length for each result snippet when constructing injection text (default 180)
sections.total_length_limit_desc: Upper limit of aggregated text length injected to LLM (default 1900)
sections.site_filter_desc: Centrally manage allowed or blocked site lists
sections.whitelist_desc: Only search content from these sites, separated by commas. Example: arxiv.org, acm.org
sections.blacklist_desc: Exclude content from these sites, separated by commas. Example: twitter.com, reddit.com
sections.model_assignment_desc: Specify preferred models and fallback strategies for different scenarios
sections.model_assignment_detail: Assign suitable models for various AI functions in the system. Different functions (such as OCR recognition, problem solving, Anki card generation, knowledge base embedding, summarization, etc.) may require different types or capabilities of models to achieve optimal results. Please make selections based on your API configuration and requirements.
sections.api_config_desc: Manage available model services and their keys, capability markers
sections.mcp_section_desc: Manage MCP servers, tool cache and connection status
sections.semantic_fts_desc: When enabled, first use FTS to quickly filter candidates, then do semantic similarity; enabled by default.
sections.timeout_desc: Search request timeout (milliseconds), avoid long waits affecting user experience

tavily_depth.description: Only affects Tavily searches. Advanced mode provides deeper results.

messages.load_failed: Failed to load advanced search settings: {{error}}
messages.caution_description: Changes apply immediately to external search. Tune during low-traffic windows and monitor latency and error rates.

auto_maintain.hint: When enabled, the app will scan missing embeddings on launch and schedule recovery jobs. Disabled by default to avoid unexpected embedding spikes.

lance_optimization.title: Lance Vector Table Optimization
lance_optimization.description: Compact files, prune old versions, improve query performance
lance_optimization.older_than_days_hint: Remove versions older than specified days (recommended: 7-30 days)
lance_optimization.delete_unverified_hint: Aggressive cleanup that may remove in-progress transaction files. Only enable when no active writes.

info.what_answer: Lance uses columnar storage format. Each write creates new files and versions. Optimization compacts small files, prunes old versions, and rebuilds indices to improve query performance and reduce disk usage.
info.why_answer: Frequent small writes generate fragmented files (_transactions, _versions, _deletions), slowing queries and increasing backup time. Regular optimization significantly improves performance.
info.when_answer: Recommended weekly, or immediately after bulk import/delete operations. The app automatically runs light optimization on startup (only removes versions >7 days old).

validations.auto_save_message: Auto-save will trigger after completing valid weights
validations.environment_not_supported: Current environment does not support saving settings

mcp_form.cwd_hint: Optional, specify the working directory for the startup command.
mcp_form.framing_hint: JSON Lines is the default; Content-Length is for processes requiring protocol headers.
mcp_form.stdio_warning_desc: Stdio mode is only available on desktop builds (Windows/macOS/Linux). Browser or mobile builds cannot launch local processes.

strategy_summary.strategy_hint: Strategy (applies to this engine, defaults to 'default')

mcp_policy.whitelist_mode_hint: When disabled, uses whitelist mode, only allowing specified safe tools
mcp_policy.danger_hint: Recommend disabling dangerous operations like file deletion, command execution, etc.

mcp_server_edit.json_hint: Keep the structure valid. Auto-validated on save. Supports standard MCP config format.

tool_permissions.title: Tool Permissions
tool_permissions.global_bypass_desc: When enabled, all tools execute directly without approval dialogs. Best for trusted environments.
tool_permissions.per_tool_desc: Set sensitivity level for individual tools. Tools without overrides use system defaults. Click an active level to reset.
tool_permissions.clear_history_confirm: Clear all historical approval memory records? Tools will no longer auto-allow/deny and will require manual approval.

mcp_errors.invalid_json_structure: Invalid JSON structure, please use mcpServers format

memory.title: Memory System
memory.description: Configure AI memory storage location. Memory files will be stored as regular notes in the specified folder.
memory.notConfigured: âš  Please select or create a memory folder
memory.privacyModeDesc: When enabled, memory write and retrieval skip external LLM rewrite/rerank to reduce sensitive data exposure.

backup_tiers.important_desc: P0 + LLM usage stats(llm_usage.db), Note attachments(notes_assets/)
backup_tiers.rebuildable_desc: P0-P1 + Vector index(lance/), can be rebuilt via re-indexing
backup_tiers.large_assets_desc: P0-P2 + Images/Documents/Videos and other media files

data_governance.export_backup_desc: Backup all data and export as ZIP
data_governance.backup_already_running: A backup task is already running
data_governance.requires_restart_message: Data restore completed. Please restart the application to ensure data consistency

pdf.title: PDF Viewer Settings
pdf.description: Adjust PDF rendering performance and feature toggles

performance.title: Rendering Performance
performance.maxDprDesc: Limit rendering resolution; lowering improves performance (1.0-3.0)
performance.scrollDowngradeDesc: Use lower resolution while scrolling, restore after stop
performance.overscanDesc: Pre-render pages outside viewport (more = smoother but more memory)

textLayer.title: Text Layer
textLayer.enableDesc: Disabling significantly improves performance; enable manually in reader when needed
textLayer.rangeDesc: Only render text layer on current page Â± N (0 = current only)

annotationLayer.title: Annotation Layer
annotationLayer.enableDesc: Show embedded links, forms, and other PDF annotations
annotationLayer.rangeDesc: Only render annotation layer on current page Â± N

defaultView.title: Default View
defaultView.scaleDesc: Initial zoom level when opening PDF
defaultView.modeDesc: Single page or side-by-side dual page

mcp_presets.title: Preset MCP Servers
mcp_presets.description: One-click add popular MCP servers (network-only, cross-platform)
mcp_presets.context7_desc: Get up-to-date documentation and code examples for any library, supporting 1000+ frameworks, no API Key required

gradingMode.maxScoreLimitDesc: Usually equals the sum of dimension scores
gradingMode.systemPromptHintSuffix: placeholder to refer to the student essay (though in most cases the AI will detect it automatically). Please describe grading criteria and tone requirements in detail.
gradingMode.confirmReset: Are you sure you want to reset "{{name}}" to default settings? Your changes will be lost.
gradingMode.errorBuiltinCannotDelete: Built-in modes cannot be deleted, but you can reset them to defaults
gradingMode.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete mode "{{name}}"?

textbook.max_pages_desc: Maximum number of pages to process for textbooks (1-50)
textbook.max_pages_hint: Content exceeding this page count will be truncated
textbook.render_scale_desc: Adjust the rendering scale for textbook pages (0.5-3.0)
textbook.render_scale_hint: Higher values produce clearer output but use more memory
textbook.export_concurrency_desc: Number of pages to export concurrently (1-4)
textbook.export_concurrency_hint: Higher concurrency speeds up export but increases system load
